Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: These are dark times, there is no denying.  Our world has perhaps faced no greater threat than it does today.  But I say this to our citizenry:  we, ever your servants, continue to defend your liberty and repel the forces that would seek to take it from you. Your Ministry remains strong...

Name: Mrs. Granger
Line: Hermione.  Your tea is ready, dear.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Coming, Mum.

Name: Mrs. Granger
Line: Don't you look lovely.  All packed?

Name: Mr. Granger
Line: Are you sure these biscuits are sugar-free?

Name: Mrs. Granger
Line: Quite sure, dear.  See the big bold letters that say 'Sugar Free'?  Dead giveaway.

Name: Mr. Granger
Line: Mm.  Yes. Hello, kitten.  Don't you look lovely.

Name: Mrs. Granger
Line: Darling, don't be suspicious the biscuits taste so good, be grateful the company's so clever...

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Obliviate.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Goodbye.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What are those?

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: Close the door.

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: These are for the Order.  So many are on the run now, it helps them to stay connected with the rest of us.  Know they're not alone...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: C'mon.  Mum's got dinner ready.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Severus.  I was beginning to worry you'd lost your way.  Come.  I've saved you a seat.

Name: Voldemort
Line: You know our hosts, of course, Severus.  Narcissa in particular has been most hospitable.  Lucius, on the other hand, is, I fear, burdened by my presence.  Are you, Lucius?

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: My lord?

Name: Voldemort
Line: Are you burdened?

Name: Narcissa Malfoy
Line: My lord is always welcome here.

Name: Voldemort
Line: You bring news I trust, Severus?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: It will happen Saturday next.  At nightfall.

Name: Voldemort
Line: And this information comes --

Name: Severus Snape
Line: -- from the source we discussed.

Name: Corban Yaxley
Line: I have heard differently, my lord. Dawlish, the Auror, let slip that the Potter boy will not be moved until the thirtieth of this month, the night before he turns seventeen.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: This is a false trail.  The Auror Office no longer plays any part in the protection of Harry Potter. Those closest to him believe we have infiltrated the Ministry.

Name: Death Eater
Line: Well, they've got that right, then, 'aven't they?

Name: Voldemort
Line: Pius, what say you?

Name: Pius Thicknesse
Line: One hears many things, my lord. Whether the truth is among them is not clear.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Spoken like a true politician. You will, I think, prove most useful, Pius.  Where will he be taken?  The boy?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: To a safehouse.  Likely the home of someone in the Order.  I'm told it has been given every manner of protection possible. Once there, it will be impractical to attack him.  We may have compromised the Ministry, but there are those who remain loyal to him.  As long as the Ministry stands, his allies within will have the means at their disposal to insure his safety.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: My lord, if I might, I'd like to volunteer myself for this task. I'd like to kill the boy.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Wormtail!  Have I not spoken to you about keeping our guest quiet?

Name: Peter Pettigrew
Line: Yes, m-my lord.  Right away, my lord.

Name: Voldemort
Line: As inspiring as I find your bloodlust, Bellatrix, I must be the one to kill Harry Potter.  But I face an unfortunate complication.  It has recently come to my attention that my wand and Potter's share the same core. They are, in some ways, twins.  We can wound but not fatally harm one another.  Which means, if I am to kill him... I will have to do it with another's wand.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Come now.  Surely one of you would like the honor?  What about... you, Lucius?

Name: Voldemort
Line: I require your wand.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Do I detect elm?

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Yes, my lord.

Name: Voldemort
Line: And the core?

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Dragon -- dragon heartstring.

Name: Voldemort
Line: My wand?  You can't possibly think I would give you my wand.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: No, my lord.

Name: Voldemort
Line: For those of you who do not know, we are joined tonight by Miss Charity Burbage who until recently taught at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.  Her specialty was Muggle studies. It is Miss Burbage's belief that Muggles are not so different from us.

Name: Voldemort
Line: She would, given her way, have us mate with them.  To her, the mixture of magical and Muggle blood is not an abomination but something to be encouraged.  I, of course, take a contrary view.  But we're all civilized here.  All adults.  We can agree to disagree.

Name: Charity Burbage
Line: Severus, please.  We're friends...

Name: Voldemort
Line: Avada Kedavra!

Name: Voldemort
Line: Nagini... Dinner.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Come now, Dudley.  Hurry up!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Time for the teary farewell.

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: I've lived in this house twenty years.  And now -- in a single night -- I'm expected to leave.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: They'll torture you.  Even Dudley. If they think you know where I'm going, they'll stop at noth--

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: You think I don't know that?  You think I don't know what they're capable of?

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: You didn't just lose a mother that night in Godric's Hollow, you know.  I lost a sister.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Do you have any?  Magic?

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: What a cruel thing to ask.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Well, this is goodbye then, boy.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: I don't understand.  Isn't he coming with us?

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Who?

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Harry.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Absolutely not.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Why?

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Well, because -- he doesn't want to, do you, boy?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Absolutely not.  Besides, I'm just a waste of space.  Isn't that right, Vernon?

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Come on, Dudley, we're off.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: I don't think you're a waste of space.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well... thanks.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: See you, Big D.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Good riddance.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: All righ', 'arry?  Yeh look fit.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Yeah, he's ruddy gorgeous.  What say we get undercover before someone murders him.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I thought you were looking after the Prime Minister, Kingsley.

Name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
Line: You're more important.

Name: Bill Weasley
Line: Hello, Harry.  Bill Weasley.

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Wasn't always this handsome.

Name: George Weasley
Line: Dead ugly.

Name: Bill Weasley
Line: True enough.  Owe it all to a werewolf by name of Greyback. Hope to repay the favor one day.

Name: Fleur Delacour
Line: You are still beautiful to me, William.

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Just remember, Fleur, once you're married:  Bill takes his steaks on the raw side now.

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Line: My husband, the joker.  By the way, wait until you hear the news! Remus and I are --

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: All right, all right!  You'll all have time for a cozy catch-up later!  We've got to get the hell out of here and soon!

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Potter, you're underage, which means you've still got the Trace on you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The Trace?

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: You sneeze and the Ministry will know who wipes your nose.  Point is, we have to use those means of transport the Trace can't detect: brooms, thestrals and the like. We'll go in pairs.  That way if anyone's out there waiting for us -- and I reckon there will be -- they won't know which Harry Potter is the real one.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The real one...?

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: I believe you're familiar with this particular brew.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No!  Absolutely not!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I told you he'd take it well.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: If you think I'm going to let people risk their lives for me --

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Never done that before, have we?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: This is different.  Taking that. Becoming me -- no.

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Well, none of us really fancy it, mate.

Name: George Weasley
Line: Yeah, imagine if something went wrong and we were stuck as scrawny, specky gits forever.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Everyone here's of age, Potter, and they've all agreed to take the risk.

Name: Mundungus Fletcher
Line: Technically, I've been coerced. Mundungus Fletcher, Mr. Potter. I've always been a huge admirer.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Nip it, Mundungus!  All right, Granger, as discussed.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Blimey, Hermione!

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Straight in here, if you please.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: For those of you who haven't taken Polyjuice Potion before, fair warning.  It tastes like goblin piss.

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Have a lot of experience with that, do you, Mad-Eye?

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Just trying to defuse the tension.

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Wow -- we're identical!

Name: George Weasley
Line: Wow -- we're identical!

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Not yet you aren't.

Name: George Weasley
Line: Don't have something a bit more sporty, do you?

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Yes, don't fancy this color at all.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Fancy this:  You're not you, so shut it and strip. You'll need to change too, Potter.

Name: Fleur Delacour
Line: Bill, look away -- I'm 'ideous.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I knew Ginny was lying about that tattoo.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry, your eyesight really is awful.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Blimey.  I almost forgot.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Right then.  We'll be pairing off. Each Potter will have a protector. As for you, Harry...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes?

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: The real Harry!  Where the devil are you, anyway?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Here.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: You'll ride with Hagrid.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Brought yeh here sixteen years ago when you were barely bigger than a Bowtruckle. Seems only righ' I should be the one ter take yeh away.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Yeah, it's all very touching. Let's go.

Name: Alastor Moody
Line: Good luck, everyone.  On the count of three.  One... two --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid!  We've got to help the others!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Can't do it, 'arry.  My job's ter get you where we're goin' safe 'n sound -- Mad-Eye's orders!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What was that?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Dragon fire!

Name: Death Eater
Line: That's him!  The real one!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Hol' tight, 'arry!  We've got ter get yeh out of here!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid... HAGRID...!

Name: Voldemort
Line: Avada...

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: Harry!  Hagrid!  What happened?! Have you seen the others?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Is no one back yet?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: They were on us from the star', Molly -- the Death Eaters.  And You-Know-Who as well.

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: Well, thank goodness you two are all right.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Haven't go' any brandy, have yeh, Molly?  Fer medicinal purposes?

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Ron and Tonks should've already been back.  Dad and Fred as well.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Oh my God!  George!

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: The house!  Quickly!

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: My boy!  My darling boy!  What've they done to you?!

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Remus!  What're you doing!

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: What creature sat in the corner the first time that Harry Potter visited my office at Hogwarts!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Are you mad...?

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: What Creature!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: A grindylow!

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: We've been betrayed.  Voldemort knew you were being moved tonight. I had to make sure you weren't an imposter.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who did this to him?

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Snape. He'll be fine, Molly.  But that's Dark Magic.  The damage is done.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Someone else is back.

Name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
Line: The last words Albus Dumbledore spoke to the pair of us?

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: 'Harry is the best hope we have. Trust him.'

Name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
Line: What gave you away?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hedwig -- I think.  She was trying to protect me --

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Hey ya -- Well... thanks.

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Line: Deserves that.  Brilliant, he was. Wouldn't be standing here without him.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Really?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Always the tone of surprise.

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: Are we the last?  Where's George?

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: Remus.  Where's my son?

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: How do you feel, Georgie?

Name: George Weasley
Line: Saint-like.

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Come again?

Name: George Weasley
Line: Saint-like... You see, I'm holy. Holey, Fred, geddit?

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: With the whole wide world of ear- related humor at your disposal, you go for holey?  Pathetic.

Name: George Weasley
Line: Reckon I'm still better-looking than you.  Better-looking than Bill, that's for sure.

Name: Bill Weasley
Line: Mad-Eye's dead.

Name: Bill Weasley
Line: Mundungus took one look at Voldemort and Disapparated.

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Mad-Eye reckoned You-Know-Who would expect the real Harry to be with the most skilled Auror.  He knew he'd be in the most danger.

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: It doesn't explain how they knew we were moving Harry tonight.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Wha'?  One of us?  Tha's mad.  I'd wager me life it wasn' none of you lot.  An' if it was me I'd kno', wouldn' I?  Talk in me sleep on occasion, I'll admit, but there's only Fang aroun' ter hear an' mostly it's gibberish an' besides I'd cut me tongue out 'fore 'd betray 'arry e'en in me dreams --

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Wha's so funny!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I trust you with my life, Hagrid. I trust everyone in this room. Understood?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: 'Ear, 'ear.

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Better.

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: No!  No!  I believed a different wand would work, I swear!

Name: Voldemont
Line: Then explain this!

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: But it makes no sense...

Name: Voldemort
Line: Perhaps our friend's loyalties lie elsewhere, Wormtail.

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: No!  There must be a way!  I'll think of something else!

Name: Voldemont
Line: I hope so, Ollivander, for your sake.  I won't be so forgiving next time...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Going somewhere?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No one else is going to die.  Not for me.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: For you?  You think Madeye died for you?  You think George took that curse for you?  You may be the Chosen One, mate, but this is a whole lot bigger than that.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Come with me.  Now.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: And leave Hermione?  Are you mad? We wouldn't last two days without her.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Don't tell her I said that. Besides, you've still got the Trace on you.  And there's the wedding...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wedding?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Bill and Fleur.  Mum's been planning it for months.  Only thing that's kept her sane, I reckon.  She'll kill me if I miss it.  Kill you too.  Rather go face to face with You-Know-Who if I'm honest.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't care about a bloody wedding -- no matter whose it is. I have to start searching for the Horcruxes.  It's the only chance we have to beat him.  And the longer we wait the stronger he gets.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Tonight's not the night, mate. You'd only be doing him a favor.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Do you think he knows?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I mean, they're bits of his soul, the Horcruxes.  Bits of him.  When Dumbledore destroyed the ring and you destroyed Tom Riddle's diary all those years ago -- he must've felt something right?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What I'm saying is, if we do this thing right, if we find the Horcruxes and begin to destroy them one by one...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Won't he know he's being hunted?

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: All together now!

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: One.  Two.  Three!

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Were you going to tell me?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: And Ron and Hermione.  They'll not be going back to Hogwarts either?

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: I see.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dumbledore didn't want anyone to know what it is we're doing.  If I tell you, I'd be betraying him.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Zip me up, will you.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Seems silly, doesn't it?  A wedding.  Given everything that's going on.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Maybe that's the best reason to have it.  Because of everything that's going on.

Name: George Weasley
Line: Morning.

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: How's it look on your end, boys?

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Brilliant!

Name: George Weasley
Line: Bloody hell, what's the Minister of Magic doing here?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Dunno.  But something tells me he didn't come to give away the bride.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: To what do we owe the pleasure, Minister?

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: I think we both know the answer to that question, Mr. Potter.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And this would be...?

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: Don't be coy, Mr. Potter.  Mr. Weasley.  Would you say you were close to your former Headmaster?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Dumbledore?  And me?  I dunno. I reckon I was just another Weasley to him.  He was always polite --

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: And you, Miss Granger?  How would you characterize your relationship?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: We were friendly, not close like Harry, but --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What's this all about?

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: This.  Despite the fact that neither of your friends appear to have been particularly close to their recently deceased Headmaster, he saw fit to remember them in his will.  Now why do you suppose that would be?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No idea.

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: Come now, you don't expect me to believe...

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: 'Herein is set forth the Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore.  First, to Ronald Bilius Weasley, I leave my Deluminator, a device of my own making, in the hope that -- when things seem most dark -- it will show him the light.'

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Dumbledore left this?  For me? Brilliant.  Er -- what is it?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Wicked.

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: 'To Miss Hermione Jean Granger, I leave my copy of The Tales of Beedle the Bard, in the hope that she will find it entertaining and instructive.'

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Mum used to read me those!  The Wizard and the Hopping Pot, Babbitty Rabbity and her Cackling Stump...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Oh, c'mon!  Beedle's stories are famous!  Babbity Rabbitty? No...?

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: 'To Harry James Potter, I leave the Snitch he caught in his first Quidditch match at Hogwarts, as a reminder of the rewards of perseverance and skill.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That's it then?

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: Not quite.  Dumbledore left you a second bequest:  The Sword of Godric Gryffindor.  Unfortunately, the Sword of Gryffindor was not Dumbledore's to give away.  As an important historical artifact, it belongs...

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: To Harry!  It belongs to Harry! It chose him!  It came to him in the Chamber of Secrets when he most needed it!

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: The sword may present itself to any worthy Gryffindor, Miss Granger.  That does not make it that wizard's property.  And in any event the current whereabouts of the sword are unknown.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excuse me?

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: The sword is missing. I won't pretend to be your friend, Mr. Potter.  But I assure you I'm not your enemy.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You'll forgive me, Minister.  But it's a little hard to tell the difference these days.

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: Dumbledore said something very similar the last time we spoke.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Where is your guard, sir?

Name: Rufus Scrimgeour
Line: I came alone.  I don't really need them anymore...

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: We want you to be the godfather.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You mean -- But that's brilliant -- I... don't know what to say.

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Say yes.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Hello, Harry!

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Oh, I've interrupted a deep thought, haven't I?  I can see it growing smaller in your eyes.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, 'course not.  How are you, Luna?

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Very well.  I was bitten by a garden gnome only moments ago.

Name: Xenophilius Lovegood
Line: Gnome saliva is enormously beneficial!  Xenophilius Lovegood. We live just over the hill!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Nice to meet you, sir.

Name: Xenophilius Lovegood
Line: I trust you know, Mr. Potter, that we at The Quibbler, unlike those toadies at the Daily Prophet, fully supported Dumbledore during his lifetime and in his death support you just as fully.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Come, Daddy.  Harry doesn't want to talk to us right now.  He's just too nice to say so.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir?  May I sit down?

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: Mr. Potter!  By all means!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I found what you wrote in the Daily Prophet very moving, sir.  I take it you knew Professor Dumbledore well?

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: I certainly knew him the longest, if you don't count his brother Aberforth -- and somehow, people never do seem to count Aberforth.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I never even knew he had a brother, sir.

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: Yes, well, Dumbledore was always very private.  Even as a boy.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir, I was wondering if you'd had much contact with him before he died.

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: The occasional owl.  Though it was strange...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Strange, sir?

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: It was the owls themselves.  They often arrived in distress.  It was clear they'd traveled great distances in some cases.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Could you tell me from where they'd come, sir?

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: I'm afraid not.  Albus' messages mostly referenced our days together as schoolboys.  They were surprisingly intimate.  When he did speak of his current activities his words would turn elliptical.  Still, I sensed he was under great stress.  Why do you ask?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Just curious.  I was... close to Professor Dumbledore.

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: Well, he treasured you, Mr. Potter, I can attest to that.  I can also tell you that when a person passes, it's only natural to rue the things left unsaid, to regret the question never asked. I knew Albus nigh on 100 years, but in many ways he will always remain a riddle even to me.

Name: Woman
Line: Don't despair, Elphias.  I'm told he's been thoroughly unriddled by Rita Skeeter.  In 800 pages no less.

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: That woman is a vulture, Muriel, and you well know it.

Name: Muriel
Line: Someone has to pick the bones to get at the truth.  I read your obituary, Elphias.  Lovely.  But you did skate over some of the sticky patches in Dumbledore's life.

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: I'm sorry you think so, Muriel.  I assure you I was writing from the heart.

Name: Muriel
Line: Yes, well, Rita Skeeter hasn't made that mistake, I'm sure.  Word has it someone talked to her, someone who knew the Dumbledore family well.  You and I both know who that is, Elphias.

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: A monstrous betrayal.  I can only conclude the rumors are true and that she has become untethered.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who are you talking about?

Name: Muriel
Line: Well, I don't suppose it'll be a secret once the book comes out. Bathilda Bagshot.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who?

Name: Muriel
Line: Who? Bathilda Bagshot!  My god, boy, she's only the most celebrated magical historian of the last century.  Don't they read History of Magic at Hogwarts anymore?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh, right.  Slipped my mind...

Name: Muriel
Line: She knew the Dumbledores as well as anyone.  She'd have letters, perhaps an interesting photograph or two.  I'm sure Rita Skeeter would have thought it well worth a trip to Godric's Hollow to take a peek into that old bird's rattled cage.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Godric's Hollow?  Bathilda Bagshot lives in Godric's Hollow?

Name: Muriel
Line: For years now.  That's where she first met Dumbledore.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excuse me?  You don't mean to say Dumbledore lived there too?

Name: Muriel
Line: Of course.  The family moved there after his father killed those three Muggles.  It was quite the scandal. Honestly, my boy, are you sure you knew him at all?

Name: Patronus
Line: The Ministry has fallen.  The Minister of Magic is dead.  They are coming...

Name: Elphias Doge
Line: Nice meeting you, Mr. Potter!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Ron!  Ron!

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Harry!  Go!  Go!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Where are we?

Line: No, you mustn't --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir?

Name: Xenophilius Lovegood
Line: You're my only hope.  They were angry, you see, about what I'd been writing, so they took her. They took my Luna... But it's really you they want...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who took her, sir?

Name: Xenophilius Lovegood
Line: Him.  Surely you call him You-Know- Who.  But his real name of course is... Voldemort.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Nooooooooo!

Name: Xenophilius Lovegood
Line: Stop!  I've got him --

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Ron!  Harry!  Take my hand!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: That treacherous old bleeder!  Is there no one we can trust!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: They've kidnapped Luna because he supported me.  He was just desperate.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I'll do the enchantments.

Name: Scabior
Line: Hello, beautiful.

Name: Gellert Grindelwald
Line: Ah, Tom, I thought you would come one day.  But surely you must know I no longer have what you seek...

Name: Voldemort
Line: If not you, then who?

Name: Gellert Grindelwald
Line: You're so innocent, Tom.  Like a schoolboy.  There's so much you don't understand...

Name: Voldemort
Line: Tell me, Grindelwald.  Tell me where to find it!  Tell me who possesses it!  The name, Grindelwald!  The name!

Name: Gellert Grindelwald
Line: Can't you guess, Tom?  It lies with him, of course.  Buried within the earth.  It is he who possesses it, even in death.  Your old friend and mine... Dumbledore.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: They exist.  The Hallows.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But he only wants the one, the last one.  That's what he's been looking for.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What're you saying?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He knows where it is, You-Know- Who.  He'll have it by the end of the night.  He's found the Elder Wand.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Don't touch her!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Stop it!

Name: Scabior
Line: Your boyfriend'll get worse than that if he doesn't behave, lovely.

Name: Scabior
Line: What happened to you, ugly?

Name: Scabior
Line: What's your name?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dudely.  Vernon Dudley.

Name: Scabior
Line: Check the list.  And you, ginger?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Stan Shunpike.

Name: Scabior
Line: Like 'ell you are.  We know skinny Stan.  Try again.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Weasley... Barney Weasley.

Name: Scabior
Line: Weasley, eh?  Wouldn't be related to that blood traitor Arthur Weasley, would you?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Piss off!  Arthur Weasley's ten times the wizard you are!

Name: Scabior
Line: Worth ten times you if I can find him.  Wasn't you that tipped him off, was it?

Name: Scabior
Line: How 'bout you, lovely?  What do they call you...?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Penelope Clearwater.  Half-blood.

Name: Scabior
Line: You smell like vanilla, Penelope. I think you're going to be my favorite.

Name: Snatcher
Line: There's no Vernon Dudley on 'ere.

Name: Fenrir Greyback
Line: Hear that, ugly?  The list says you're lying.  How come you don't want us to know who you are?  Hm?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The list is wrong.  I told you who I am --

Name: Scabior
Line: Change of plans, boys.  We won't be taking this lot to the Ministry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What did you put on me?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: A Stinging Jinx.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: How long will it last?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Not long.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Show me. Get Draco. Well?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: I can't be sure.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Draco. Look closely, son. If we are the ones to hand Potter over to the Dark Lord... ...everything would be forgiven. All would be as it was, you understand?

Name: Scabior
Line: Now, we won't be forgetting who actually caught him, I hope, Mr. Malfoy.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: You dare to talk to me like that in my own house?

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Lucius. Don't be shy, sweetie. Come over. Now, if this isn't who we think it is, Draco, and we call him, he'll kill us all. We need to be absolutely sure.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: What's wrong with his face?

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Yes, what is wrong with his face?

Name: Snatcher
Line: He came to us like that. Something he picked up in the forest, I reckon.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Or ran into a Stinging Jinx. Was it you, dearie? Give me her wand. We'll see what her last spell was. Ah. Got you. What is that? Where'd you get that from?

Name: Snatcher
Line: It was in her bag when we searched her. Reckon it's mine now. Are you mad? Go! Get out!

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Cissy, put the boys in the cellar. I want to have a little conversation with this one, girl-to-girl.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What are we gonna do? We can't leave Hermione alone with her.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Ron? Harry?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Luna?

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: That sword is meant to be in my vault at Gringotts. How did you get it? What else did you and your friends take from my vault?!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I didn't take anything. Please. I didn't take anything.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: I don't believe it.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: We have to do something.

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: There's no way out of here. We've tried everything. It's enchanted.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Please! please!

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Shut up!

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: You're bleeding, Harry. That's a curious thing to keep in your sock.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Help us.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Let her go.

Name: Peter Pettigrew
Line: Shut up. Get back. You, goblin, come with me.

Name: Dobby
Line: Aah!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby? What are you doing here?

Name: Dobby
Line: Dobby has come to rescue Harry Potter, of course. Dobby will always be there for Harry Potter.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You can Apparate in and out of this room? Could you take us with you?

Name: Dobby
Line: Of course, sir. I'm an elf.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Works for me.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby, I want you to take Luna and Mr. Ollivander--

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Shell Cottage on the outskirts of Tinworth. Trust me.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Whenever you're ready, sir.

Name: Dobby
Line: Sir? I like her very much. Meet me at the top of the stairs in 10 seconds.

Name: Peter Pettigrew
Line: Ow.

Name: Dobby
Line: Who gets his wand?

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: I'm only going to ask you once more, goblin. Think very, very carefully before you answer.

Name: Griphook
Line: I don't know.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: You don't know? Why weren't you doing your job? Who got into my vault? Who stole it? Who stole it? Well?

Name: Griphook
Line: When I was last in your vault, the sword was there. Oh, well then, perhaps it just walked out on its own then.

Name: Griphook
Line: There is no place safer than Gringotts.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Liar! Consider yourself lucky, goblin. The same won't be said for this one.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Like hell.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Expellliarmus!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Stupefy.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Stop! Drop your wands. I said, drop them! Pick them up, Draco, now. Well, well, well, look what we have here. It's Harry Potter. He's all bright and shiny and new again, just in time for the Dark Lord. Call him. Call him.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Stupefy!

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Stupid elf. You could've killed me.

Name: Dobby
Line: Dobby never meant to kill. Dobby only meant to maim or seriously injure.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: How dare you take a witch's wand? How dare you defy your masters?

Name: Dobby
Line: Dobby has no master. Dobby is a free elf. And Dobby has come to save Harry Potter and his friends.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hermione. You're all right. We're safe. We're all safe.

Name: Dobby
Line: Harry Potter.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby. Dobby. No, just-- Hold on. Hold on. Look, just hold on, okay? We'll fix you. Hermione will have something. In your bag. Hermione? Hermione? What is it? Help me.

Name: Dobby
Line: Such a beautiful place... ...to be with friends. Dobby is happy to be with his friend... ...Harry Potter.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: We should close his eyes. Don't you think? There. Now he could be sleeping.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I want to bury him. Properly. Without magic.
